body:
I'm getting the below error.  I think you missed a call to get_rrd_name?

```
04/19/16 18:10:26  ENGINE TypeError('get_rrd_name() takes at least 3 arguments (2 given)',)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/cherrypy/wsgiserver/wsgiserver2.py", line 1302, in communicate
    req.respond()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/cherrypy/wsgiserver/wsgiserver2.py", line 831, in respond
    self.server.gateway(self).respond()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/cherrypy/wsgiserver/wsgiserver2.py", line 2115, in respond
    response = self.req.server.wsgi_app(self.env, self.start_response)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/cherrypy/_cptree.py", line 290, in __call__
    return app(environ, start_response)
  File "/usr/share/condor-ce/condor_ce_view", line 128, in __call__
    retval = self.app(environ, custom_start_response)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/htcondorce/web.py", line 497, in application
    return callback(environ, start_response)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/htcondorce/web.py", line 283, in pilots
    fname = htcondorce.rrd.get_rrd_name(environ, "pilots")
TypeError: get_rrd_name() takes at least 3 arguments (2 given)
```
